name: Granite silk top
description:
Shine a little with this granite grey racerback top with soft powder pink and off white hues. You will find this easy to match - just wear it over a pair of denims or maybe try tucking it into your fave high waisted pencil skirt.  

Measurements:
Size 32 Petite

Front Length: 55 cm
Back Length: 61 cm
Bust: 84 cm
Waist: 86 cm


Size 34

Front Length: 55 cm
Back Length: 61 cm
Bust: 88 cm
Waist: 90 cm

Size 36
Front Length: 59 cm
Back Length: 63 cm
Bust: 93 cm
Waist: 94 cm

Care instructions: 

Do not bleach
Low heat iron 
Dry clean recommend
Lay to dry

* please note that colour may slightly differ from photos above
* only available in 3 sizes
*send me a message or mail at farahlai@mail.com if you have any enquiries at all

name: Lazuli silk top
description:
Glow in this royal lapis lazuli blue silk top with contrasting burnt orange and yellow hues this summer. Made from crepe de chine, this lightweight top wears delicately under a solid coloured cardigan for a pop of colour!

name: Candyfloss top
description:
Add a candyfloss pink crepe de chine top to your wardrobe this summer and enjoy layering it into the autumn season. 
Lightweight top with 3 panels featuring pink, grey and an off white. If you already are familiar with crepe de chine silks, it wears elegantly over your skin and in this colour, pairs well against light greys.

Size 32 Petite

Front length : 53cm
